articles.content: If you're a PlayStation Plus member, you're entitled to a handful of games each month. When PS5 launched back in November, the number of monthly games went up to three two PS4 games, and one on PS5. … [+1459 chars]

articles.content: Apple has been clobbered with another lawsuit that claims the Californian company intentionally slowed down older iPhone models. The lawsuit, which was filed in Italy by consumer advocacy group Euroc… [+2728 chars]
